title: Opposition Parties must focus on Social Ill's instead of Poltical and Ideological Interrogation styl
text: Let me voice my disappointment on the recent debate to impeaching the President of South Africa frankly I think the DA on this regard has lacked the analytical part of analysing before they can Proceed with their Persuit though legally we might have been obliged to Arrest albhasir but Continental relations,social and Economical that decision was not gonna assist South Afrika and we were going to be labelled by Our African Brothers as their own worst enemy for siding with the Western Countries...for the first time I think the President Zuma Of South Africa was spot on in protecting and ensuring that Bashir is not arrested if people have a problem with that they must remember South Africa is a Sovereign State.
